DOC.brief_summary: There three main cycle regimen use endometrial preparation frozen embryo transfer（FET） : natural cycle ( NC ) with/without ovulation triggering , hormone replacement therapy cycle ( HRT ) endometrium artificially prepared estrogen progesterone hormone with/without gonadotrophin release hormone agonist ( GnRH-a ) regulation , ovulation induce cycle ( OI ) follicular development support increase dos gonadotrophin hormone ovulation induce . At present , still sufficient evidence kind FET cycle regimen plan advantage . The purpose study compare pregnancy outcome NC-FET HRT-FET woman regular cycle .
DOC.brief_title: A Study : Different Outcomes Between Natural Cycle Hormone Replacement Cycle FET
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective randomize controlled trial . Patients regular cycle undergo FET reproductive medicine renter Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hospital recruited，who elder 40 3 frozen embryo . They randomize receive either NC-FET cycle ( group NC-A ) HRT-FET cycle ( group HRT-B ) . In group NC-A , ovulation monitor spontaneously induced human chorionic gonadotropin ( HCG ) dominant follicle large 18mm without luteinizing hormone surge ( LH ) . Transfer thaw embryos perform 4 day LH /HCG administration 3 day ovulation observe . In group HRT-B , oral estradiol , 2 mg , daily , introduced cycle day 3 increase dos protocol . If endometrial thickness great 7mm , progesterone 40-60 mg oil administer via intramuscular injection . Transfer thaw embryos perform 3 day later . This study approve reproductive medicine ethic committee Sun Yet-sen Memorial Hospital .
